entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.7°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
